@Team_Rocket wrote:

[/quote]
no :[/quote]

Make an exception in your Yell method for players with specific names. You shouldn’t do it this way, but It’s PI so you can’t really make it any worse.

item.title: Yell help[pi] repp+
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.playerRights == 1){

    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Moderator]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
   
    c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Administrator]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.playerRights == 4){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
  }
  }
 }
}
    
    
}[/code]

I just ripped this out of a source, you can you use it how you want. I suggest looking at it then looking at yours and seeing where you went wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Yell help[pi] repp+
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

[code=abap]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

					switch (c.playerRights){
						case 0:
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Player]</col>"+ (c.playerName)+": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))+"");
						break;
						case 6:
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Player]</col>"+ (c.playerName)+": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5))+"");
						break;
						case 1:
							c2.sendMessage("[<col=35584>MOD</col>]"+ c.properName +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						break;
						case 2:
							c2.sendMessage("[<col=00008B>ADMIN</col>]"+ (c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						break;
						
						case 3:
							c2.sendMessage("[<col=FF0080>Owner</col>]"+ (c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						break;
						case 4:
							c2.sendMessage("[<col=13107200>Donator</col>]"+ (c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						break;
						case 5:
						c2.sendMessage("[Support]"+ (c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						break;
					}
				}
			}
		}
}[/code]

hey guys, that’s my yell code, and i’m trying to make custom yell tags for certain people, and i cant figure out how, can anyone help?

Read full topic
